attributes.action: Make ctc available  to people who receive ESA who can't get it on UC
attributes.background: I want a change to child tax credits because people who claim esa can't claim child tax credits with support for child and people who are struggling

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
